name: International Forum for Sustainable Underwater Activities
goal:
- Promoting and defending sustainable underwater activities.

- Contribute in developing new regulations related with sustainable use of marine environment, mainly underwater activities and recreational fisheries.

- Promoting and defending sustainable fisheries.

- Restoring marine ecosystems

- Contributing with science to achieve a better marine knowledge.
euInitiatives:
Fisheries and Maritime affairs
Common Fisheries Policy
Blue growth
Maritime Spatial Planning
